s.text: Shoes are a peculiar gift, but I've recommended them to many people.

Normally, the first thing I do when I get home is kick off my shoes, but these were so comfortable that I'd realize, late into the evening, that I'd forgotten to take them off.
If you've ever spent an evening plunging your wrists into ice water, you are an easy mark for devices that promise to relieve carpal tunnel syndrome.
I found them bulky, and their primary benefit seemed to come from the heat retention qualities of the neoprene.
